name: Detective Weasel
description:
Nobody takes Detective Weasel seriously at the Animal Police Department. Help Weasel prove his innocence and find the real culprit in this visual novel mystery game.

Credits:

Michael Balkevicius-Game designer/Programmer

Devon Roe-Script Writer

Alyssa Welch-Artist

Tim Keller- Audio

This is an early work in progresses of our game. We are hoping to get feedback on it so we can improve it.
